= Otter API to Topsy = 

Otter API is an RESTful HTTP web service to Topsy. Topsy is a search engine that ranks URLs by the number and quality of tweets that mention the URL. Topsy computes a reputation (influence score) for each twitter user (referred to as an author) - which is based on the who retweets the author. The influence factors in to search result rankings. 

The Otter API provides access to topsy search results, url information and author information along with a the intermediate data (like author influence) that is used in creation of search rankings. Most of what you see on http://topsy.com/ is available through this API. 

This is v1.0 of Otter API. This version of the api is accessible via the url: `http://otter.topsy.com/`.
